title: Fixing Commit Validation Error After PAN-OS Upgrade: Application-Filter 'http' Already in Use
description: A practical troubleshooting guide to resolving the PAN-OS commit validation error caused by application-filter names conflicting with internal protocol names after upgrade.

title: Creating a Custom VM-Series Firewall Image on Google Cloud Platform
description: A practical field guide to creating a custom Palo Alto Networks VM-Series firewall image on Google Cloud Platform when the required PAN-OS version is not available in the Marketplace.

title: Installing GlobalProtect on Windows: A Practical Guide from the Field
description: A practical field guide to installing and configuring Palo Alto Networks GlobalProtect VPN client on Windows, with insights into portal architecture and troubleshooting.
